query.name: get_account_symbol_pointers
query.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT uplink_equipment_type_symbol.symbol_pointer, uplink_equipment_type_symbol.equipment_type_id, uplink_equipment_type.name, uplink_equipment_type_symbol.equipment_type_symbol_id, uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id, uplink_equipment_type_images.equipment_type_image_id
FROM uplink_equipment_type_symbol, uplink_equipment_type
LEFT JOIN uplink_equipment_type_images ON uplink_equipment_type_images.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id AND uplink_equipment_type_images.account_id=? AND uplink_equipment_type_images.deletion_datetime > ?
WHERE uplink_equipment_type_symbol.account_id=? AND uplink_equipment_type.account_id=? AND uplink_equipment_type_symbol.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_equipment_type_symbol.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id AND uplink_equipment_type.deletion_datetime > ? ORDER BY uplink_equipment_type.name ASC
